options.content:
Globus Tasks by Resource

  • This dashboard shows top tasks from the selected organization and associated resources using the NetSage Science Registry.
  • Select an organization from the list above, then select a resource.
  • Globus Task endpoints are de-identified, and private data sources are marked "Private".
  • Private Task data rates and totals are available via the toggle at the top of this dashboard.
  • All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.src_organization:$Organization AND (${internal:raw}(meta.src_organization:$Organization AND meta.dst_organization:$Organization)) AND meta.sensor_id:$Sensors AND meta.dst_organization:${confidential:raw} AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND meta.src_resource_name:$resources
